title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: The file is marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made, and code assist does not appear.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirtied.
SR:
1. Open the file
2. Activate code assist
3. Note that the file is marked as dirtied even if no changes are made
4. Observe that code assist does not appear
